meanings.definition: The quality or state of being able to be terminated or ended.
meanings.sent1: The terminableness of the movie made it easy to predict the ending.
meanings.sent2: The terminableness of the project allowed us to plan our next steps.
meanings.sent3: The terminableness of the book made it a quick read.
meanings.sent4: The terminableness of the journey was a relief after a long trip.
meanings.sent5: The terminableness of the meeting was a welcome break from the long discussions.

meanings.definition: The capacity for being brought to an end or conclusion.
meanings.sent1: We appreciated the terminableness of the class, as it ended on time.
meanings.sent2: The terminableness of the game allowed us to declare a winner.
meanings.sent3: The terminableness of the play left us wanting more.
meanings.sent4: The terminableness of the concert marked the end of a great evening.
meanings.sent5: The terminableness of the show made it easier to plan our evening.
